The paper discusses the use of word embeddings for text classification, which is a common topic in natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning. The specific task of classifying translational stages of research is not a well-defined sub-category in arXiv CS, but the use of NLP and machine learning techniques suggests that the paper is likely to be relevant to several sub-categories. cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category, as it specifically deals with NLP and related topics. cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.DL (Deep Learning) are also likely sub-categories, as they all involve machine learning techniques that could be applied to text classification.
